name: Computer Science
description: Study of algorithms, programming, data structures, and software development. Covers theoretical foundations and practical applications of computing.

name: Software Engineering
description: Focus on designing, developing, and maintaining software systems using engineering principles and methodologies.

name: Business Administration
description: Learn management, finance, marketing, and organizational leadership to run successful businesses.

name: Economics
description: Study of economic theory, policy, market analysis, and resource allocation in society.

name: Medicine
description: Medical training for diagnosing, treating, and preventing diseases and injuries.

name: Law
description: Study of legal systems, principles, and practices for justice and governance.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Design, construction, and maintenance of physical infrastructure like roads, bridges, and buildings.

name: Agriculture
description: Study of farming, crop production, animal husbandry, and sustainable food systems.

name: Fine Arts
description: Creative expression through painting, sculpture, music, and performance arts.

name: Education
description: Training for teaching, curriculum development, and educational leadership.
